detectors.description:

detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__50.sol#354-369) can write the state variable array at will

	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(toSend) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__50.sol#366)
